data.eml:eml: SNH Invertebrate Site Condition Monitoring 2013/14: Loch Lubnaig Marshes SSSI

This dataset was gathered as part of a Scottish Natural Heritage contract in 2013/14. It provides the results of invertebrate surveys designed to inform Site Condition Monitoring at Loch Lubnaig Marshes SSSI. These surveys targeted the notified Diptera assemblage feature (Tetanocera freyi and Cordilura atrata), but other invertebrate taxa were also recorded.
